:v-model.description: The name or index value of the currently selected tag
:v-model.description_zh: 当前选中标签的名称或索引值

fixed.description: Whether it is fixed at the bottom or not

border.description: Whether to display the outer border

active-color.description: Select the color of the label

inactive-color.description: The color of the label is unchecked

route.description: Specifies whether to enable the routing mode

placeholder.description: When pinned to the bottom, whether to generate a placeholder element of equal height at the label position
placeholder.description_zh: 固定在底部时，是否在标签位置生成一个等高的占位元素

safe-area-inset-bottom.description: Whether to enable [Bottom Security Zone Adaptation](#/en-CN/advanced-usage#di-bu-an-quan-qu-gua-pei) and enable it by default when fixed is set
safe-area-inset-bottom.description_zh: 是否开启[底部安全区适配](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/advanced-usage#di-bu-an-quan-qu-gua-pei)，设置 fixed 时默认开启

:before-change.description: The callback function before switching tags, returning 'false' to prevent switching, supports returning Promise
:before-change.description_zh: 切换标签前的回调函数，返回 `false` 可阻止切换，支持返回 Promise

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when a tag is switched
